headline: Galleon Gold Enters into Agreement to Repurchase Royalty on the West Cache Project
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - October 16, 2025) - Galleon Gold Corp. (TSXV: GGO) (FSE: 3H90) (the "Company" or "Galleon Gold") is pleased to announce it has entered into an agreement (the "Agreement") with a wholly-owned subsidiary of Newmont Corporation ("Newmont"), to reacquire a 3% net smelter return royalty (the "Royalty") on the Company's West Cache Gold Project ("West Cache" or the "Project") located in Timmins, Ontario. Pursuant to the Agreement, and subject to the Company raising..
